quote: Days passed in a grey fog. I was becalmed. Without energy, without hope, with no sight of land, I could remember feeling better but I somehow couldn't believe in it. There was nothing but this.
quote_letters: DAYS PASSED IN A GREY FOG I WAS BECALMED WITHOUT ENERGY WITHOUT HOPE WITH NO SIGHT OF LAND I COULD REMEMBER FEELING BETTER BUT I SOMEHOW COULDNT BELIEVE IN IT THERE WAS NOTHING BUT THIS
